scenario

Interface Scenario

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Printable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Base, Robot, Rock, Tree, Water

    public interface Scenario
extends Printable
    Scenario
    General interface for scenarios that appear in the arena.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHP()
      Remaining HP to the scenario be removed from the map.
      Player getTeam()
      Returns the team of a given scenario (ordinary elements should be Nature).
      int takeDamage(int damage)
      Amount of damage taken by a scenario.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Prints the scenario in a more legible way, with debug purposes.

      • Methods inherited from interface gui.Printable

        name

    • Method Detail

      • getHP

        int getHP()
        Remaining HP to the scenario be removed from the map.

      • takeDamage

        int takeDamage(int damage)
        Amount of damage taken by a scenario. If the scenario should not be destroyed, this method may have no action over it HP.
        Parameters:
        damage - Total of points to be subtracted from the HP.
        Returns:
        Scenario's remining HP.

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Prints the scenario in a more legible way, with debug purposes.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getTeam

        Player getTeam()
        Returns the team of a given scenario (ordinary elements should be Nature).
        Returns:
        Player that owns the scenario
